snippet: The star point guard Chris Paul, who returned Sunday after an 18-game absence, is set to lead Los Angeles against Portland, which has struggled recently with its 3-point shooting.
lead_paragraph: The star point guard Chris Paul, who returned Sunday after an 18-game absence, is set to lead Los Angeles against Portland, which has struggled recently with its 3-point shooting.

headline.main: N.B.A. Game of the Week: With Paul Back, Beware of Clippers
headline.print_headline: N.B.A. Game of the Week: With Paul Back, Beware of Clippers
